searches.name: Grandma Double-Dosed
searches.context: grandma doubled her heart pills cause she FORGOT she already took em

searches.name: Yellow Halos Acid Trip
searches.context: seeing YELLOW HALOS around the TV like she's on an ACID TRIP - digoxin visual disturbance

searches.name: Heart Rate 38
searches.context: heart's beatin THIRTY-EIGHT times a minute - severe bradycardia

searches.name: Closed Casket Warning
searches.context: one bad rhythm away from a CLOSED CASKET

searches.name: Vomiting Chaos
searches.context: Vomitin EVERYWHERE confused as HELL potassium TWO POINT NINE

searches.name: EKG Modern Art
searches.context: her EKG looks like modern ART - bizarre rhythm digoxin effect

searches.name: Tick Tock Dying
searches.context: TICK TOCK grandma's DYIN before she FLATLINES on the kitchen floor

searches.name: Morons Reached for Calcium
searches.context: I KNOW half you MORONS reached for calcium - wrong answer roast

searches.name: Murdered Grandma
searches.context: CONGRATULATIONS you just MURDERED someones GRANDMOTHER - calcium makes dig tox WORSE

searches.name: Absolute Walnut Insult
searches.context: you ABSOLUTE WALNUT - roasting wrong answer

searches.name: DigiFab Saves Grandma
searches.context: Its C DigiFab! Binds the digoxin YANKS it out grandma LIVES - correct answer celebration
